# Daily index
#
# This file is generated by `daily/update_index.py`.

This index tracks daily folders stored in `daily/`.

## How to use

- Create a new folder for each day using `YYYY-MM-DD/`.
- Keep a short `README.md` inside each day folder with:
  - `# Daily - YYYY-MM-DD`
  - `Date: YYYY-MM-DD`
  - Optional `Summary:` line
- Run `python daily/update_index.py` to refresh this index (newest first).

## Entries (newest first)
- 2026-01-21 - [2026-01-21](./2026-01-21/) - Daily note created.
- 2026-01-20 - [2026-01-20](./2026-01-20/) - Daily note created.
- 2026-01-19 - [2026-01-19](./2026-01-19/) - Daily note created.
- 2026-01-18 - [2026-01-18](./2026-01-18/) - Pathfinding for near-term life change.
- 2026-01-16 - [2026-01-16](./2026-01-16/) - DP/DR recovery day focused on re-connection.
